name: City Of The Undead
summary: City Of The Undead is a survival role-playing game that combines classic turn-based combat, exploration, card development, management, puzzle solving and other elements. The protagonist leads his companions through difficult adventures and successfully finds the abandoned hotel. Taking this as a stronghold, he constantly explores new and unknown areas, constantly accepts new powerful companions, constantly expands the activity area, and looks for lost relatives, explore the truth of the world.
